description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Save the world by catching the deadly balls of Ice 9 before they explode!  This simple yet addictive game will keep you playing "just one more game" to beat your high score.
